com.hamweather.aeris.maps

Class AerisMapView

  • java.lang.Object
    • FrameLayout
      • com.hamweather.aeris.maps.AerisMapView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnCameraChangeListener, com.hamweather.aeris.communication.AerisProgressListener, AnimationControlDelegate

    public class AerisMapView
extends FrameLayout
implements com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnCameraChangeListener, com.hamweather.aeris.communication.AerisProgressListener, AnimationControlDelegate
    Aeris map view that provides features to automatically query Aeris API for tiles, point data information on warnings, lightning, fires, and storms. TODO: Support multiple map types other than just google
    Author:
    Ben Collins
